page.description: For use in a Form or Report that is based on a set with one or more one-to-many child tables. Returns .t. if the current parent record has any children in the specified tableAlias. Supported by V10.

argument.name: result
argument.description: .t. if the current parent record has any children in the specified tableAlias.

argument.name: tableAlias
argument.description: Table to check for children of the current parent record
